data.title: Scandinavian Oil
meta_keywords: petroleum gas scandinavian oil-gas magazine news norway petroleum oil scandinavian oil-gas magazine news norway petroleum oil gas news
data.meta_description: Scandinavian Oil-Gas Magazine is your premier source for in-depth information on developments within the oil & gas industry in the Northern Seas. The magazine covers all areas of the offshore industry, from policy to platforms, research to rig retirement.
data.text:
In addition to using the main navigation, you can find pages by browsing “tags,” a set of informal categories that describe this site’s contents.
